mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM tb_permission p INNER JOIN tb_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.deleted = false ORDER BY p.sort ASC, p.create_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM tb_permission p INNER JOIN tb_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN tb_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted = false ORDER BY p.sort ASC, p.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted = false ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
